description:
The course will teach you how to cook amazing healthy dairy free, gluten free and sugar free desserts that taste amazing and will impress everyone you make them for. Your kids will love them and will not even be able to tell the difference.

There are three desserts and one bonus hot chocolate recipe that i will be teaching in this course

1. Raspberry rose "cheese" cake

2. Heavenly strawberry slice

3. Raw Carmel slice

Video teaching

recipes will be provided
title: Raw dessert cooking
